casebody.data:
The State ex rel. York, Appellant, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio, Appellee, et al.

[Cite as State ex rel. York v. Indus. Comm. (2000), 90 Ohio St.3d 70.]

(No. 00-36 Submitted July 25, 2000 Decided September 20, 2000.) Becker, Reed, Tilton & Hastings and Dennis A. Becker, for appellant. Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and William D. Haders, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur. Douglas, J.', dissents. F.E. Sweeney, J., dissents and would reverse the judgment of the court of appeals.
